net.canarymod.api.entity

Interface EntityItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Entity

    public interface EntityItem
extends Entity
    EntityItem wrapper
    Author:
    Jason (darkdiplomat)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      short getAge()
      Get item's age.
      When age is greater than or equal to 6000, the entity is destroyed.
      short getHealth()
      Gets the health of the Item.
      Used to specify what damages cause the item to be destroyed.
      Health is limited to a max of 255
      Item getItem()
      Get the Item attached to the EntityItem.
      java.lang.String getOwner()
      Returns the owner of this item.
      int getPickUpDelay()
      Gets the ticks before allowing to be picked up.
      When this equals 0, it can be picked up.
      If below 0, it can never be picked up.
      java.lang.String getThrower()
      Returns the thrower of this item.
      void setAge(short age)
      Set items age.
      When age is greater than or equal to 6000, the entity is destroyed.
      void setHealth(short health)
      Sets the health of the Item.
      Health is limited to a max of 255
      void setItem(Item item)
      Sets the Item attached to the EntityItem)
      void setOwner(java.lang.String owner)
      Sets the owner of this item.
      void setPickUpDelay(int delay)
      Sets the ticks before allowing to be picked up.
      If set below 0, pick up is never allowed.
      void setThrower(java.lang.String thrower)
      Sets the thrower of this item.

    • Method Detail

      • setAge

        void setAge(short age)
        Set items age.
        When age is greater than or equal to 6000, the entity is destroyed.
        Parameters:
        age - the age to set

      • getAge

        short getAge()
        Get item's age.
        When age is greater than or equal to 6000, the entity is destroyed.
        Returns:
        age the age of the item.

      • getPickUpDelay

        int getPickUpDelay()
        Gets the ticks before allowing to be picked up.
        When this equals 0, it can be picked up.
        If below 0, it can never be picked up.
        Returns:
        the ticks before pickup

      • setPickUpDelay

        void setPickUpDelay(int delay)
        Sets the ticks before allowing to be picked up.
        If set below 0, pick up is never allowed.
        Parameters:
        delay - the ticks before allowing pickup or -1 for never pickup

      • getHealth

        short getHealth()
        Gets the health of the Item.
        Used to specify what damages cause the item to be destroyed.
        Health is limited to a max of 255
        Returns:
        the health

      • setHealth

        void setHealth(short health)
        Sets the health of the Item.
        Health is limited to a max of 255
        Parameters:
        health - the item health

      • getItem

        Item getItem()
        Get the Item attached to the EntityItem.
        Returns:
        Item

      • setItem

        void setItem(Item item)
        Sets the Item attached to the EntityItem)
        Parameters:
        item - the Item to attach

      • getOwner

        java.lang.String getOwner()
        Returns the owner of this item. Only the owner of an item can pick it up.
        Returns:
        The name of the owner this item's owner

      • setOwner

        void setOwner(java.lang.String owner)
        Sets the owner of this item. Only the owner of an item can pick it up.
        Parameters:
        owner - The name of this item's new owner, or null to unset the owner

      • getThrower

        java.lang.String getThrower()
        Returns the thrower of this item. This is the name of the player who dropped this item. Used for the "Diamonds to you!" achievement.
        Returns:
        The name of this item's thrower

      • setThrower

        void setThrower(java.lang.String thrower)
        Sets the thrower of this item. This is the name of the player who dropped this item. Used for the "Diamonds to you!" achievement.
        Parameters:
        thrower - The name of this item's new thrower, or null to unset the thrower
